ValidationRule.description: Closed Won is set by the Automated System and not by Reps
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(OR( ( $Profile.Name='Marketing User'), ($Profile.Name='Read Only'), ($Profile.Name='Solution Manager'), ($Profile.Name='Standard User'), ($Profile.Name='Xometry Sales User'), ( $Profile.Name='Xometry Service User'), ( $Profile.Name='Xometry Sales Leadership') ), ( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Closed Won') && ISCHANGED( StageName )))
&& !$Permission.Ignore_All_VR && !$Permission.Ignore_Opp_VR
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunities can only be set to stage Close Won by the automated System. Please pick a different stage. If this is a duplicate Opportunity these will be auto closed in the future.
